description.en: Sensor entities harvest data from the real world
description.jp: センサーエンティティは、現実世界からデータを収集します

description.en: The coverage or impact area of a given Asset or Sensor/Actuator. For example: an air-treatment unit might serve several Rooms or a full Building. Note that Assets can also service one another, e.g., an air-treatment Asset might serve an air diffuser Asset. Inverse of: servedBy
